external_games.name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition – Hero Cosmetic Pack – Lizzie

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition – Hero Cosmetic Pack: Lizzie
summary: Meet Lizzie the Pirate (British): Although raised as daughter of an English nobleman, Elisabet Ramsey prefers to be buccaneering in the Caribbean with - and without - Her Majesty's letter of marque.
